sentences.sentence: I want to have some egg tarts.
Queen Elizabeth I, who loves sweets, has a soft spot for egg tarts.
sentences.translation: 嗜好甜食的女王伊丽莎白一世也对蛋挞情有独钟。

sentences.sentence: During the Henry period, egg tarts may also contain ingredients such as minced pork or beef bone marrow, but always covered with sweet custard.
sentences.translation: 在亨利时期，蛋挞还可能含有猪肉末或牛骨髓等食材，但总要覆盖上甜甜的蛋奶糊。
